What's happening?

As part of the National Stations Improvement Programme work at Shrewsbury station, the passenger lift serving Platforms 4 to 7 will be taken out of service temporarily, to allow the contractors to install a concrete floor for the new waiting room from Friday 28 February until Friday 7 March 2014 inclusive.

How will it affect my journey?

This will affect your journey if you need to use the lift to get to or from the platform.

If you're starting your train journey from Shrewsbury Station please use the lift to Platform 3 and wait on the platform outside the lift for a member of staff to come and accompany you to your departure platform.

If you're ending your train journey or changing trains at Shrewsbury Station, please make yourself known to a member of platform staff who will help you change platforms or get to ground level.

Arriva Trains Wales and Network Rail apologise for the inconvenience caused to you whilst making improvements to your station.
